name: Sure Spark
description:
If you were to guess based on their legendary marketing achievements, you would think that Sure Spark employees are the byproduct of scandalous intimate relations between the Gods and beautiful mortals. But you would be wrong. The truth is that they are simply the most awesome and intelligent regular human beings currently walking the earth, and they love marketing. If you have a website, Sure Spark can get people to come to it and buy.
And if you don't have a website, they can make one for you.
